description: The share of property held by Britons may be falling in France, but the opposite is happening in Eymet.
title: Britons give Brexit boost to idyllic French village
title_page: Britons give Brexit boost to idyllic French village - BBC News
maintext: "As time's gone on, people have either got used to it, or frustrated with it, or have actually bought despite it," she told me. "A lot of people have tried to work to the deadlines around Brexit. So last year was the busiest year we've ever had."
